name: Return of the Mage
description:
The tree people was living in peace, until you arrive to kill you them, but before you'll start, they enclose you, many time after you get free from the prison, now you'll return for your revenge. This is your only opportunity to reach your goal as a villain, but it won't be easy, the are stronger since the last time you met with them. Your only priority is kill "The big tree".
